doc:
Bill Owen (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bill_Owen_(actor) 0 William John Owen Rowbotham, (14 March 1914 – 12 July 1999), known professionally as Bill Owen, was an English actor and songwriter. He was the father of actor Tom Owen. He is best known for portraying Compo Simmonite in the Yorkshire based BBC comedy series Last of the Summer Wine for 27 years. He died in July 1999, his last appearance on-screen being shown in April 2000. William_John_Owen_Rowbotham , ( 14_March_1914 – 12_July_1999 ) , known professionally as Bill_Owen , was an_English_actor_and_songwriter . He was the_father of actor_Tom_Owen . He is_best_known for portraying Compo_Simmonite in the_Yorkshire based BBC_comedy_series_Last of the_Summer_Wine for 27_years . He died in July_1999 , his_last_appearance_on-screen being_shown in April_2000 .
